title: Crime and Punishment
description: A novel by Fyodor Dostoevsky, exploring the moral dilemmas of a young man who commits murder.

title: War and Peace
description: A historical novel by Leo Tolstoy, set during the Napoleonic Wars, focusing on the lives of Russian aristocrats.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: A novel by Oscar Wilde about a man who remains eternally young while his portrait ages, reflecting his moral corruption.

title: Frankenstein
description: A novel by Mary Shelley about a scientist who creates a living being from body parts, only to be horrified by the result.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A novel by Emily BrontÃ« about the passionate and destructive love between Heathcliff and Catherine Earnshaw.

title: The Scarlet Letter
description: A novel by Nathaniel Hawthorne set in Puritan New England, about a woman who bears an illegitimate child.

title: Dracula
description: A Gothic horror novel by Bram Stoker, telling the story of Count Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England.
